name: Man in a Bunny Suit vs the UFOs
name_original: Man in a Bunny Suit vs the UFOs
description:
The city is being overrun by aliens and their weird machines. With the population in peril, there is only one person to call.

Man in a Bunny Suit.

Made for the Kenney Jam 2021

Supports gamepad or keyboard and mouse.

Soundtrack composed by AIVA (Artificial Intelligence Virtual Artist): https://www.aiva.ai
